## HTMLView.insertBefore() method

Inserts the view's DOM nodes before the referenced node.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
insertBefore(node: Node): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  node | <code>Node</code> | The node to insert the view's DOM before. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
